description: Coverage exclusion configuration for targeted coverage calculation

exclude_reasons.*_pb: Auto-generated protobuf modules - not part of business logic
exclude_reasons.*_ctl_*: CLI/control modules - operational tooling, not core router logic

notes: Modules matching exclude_patterns or listed in exclude_modules are removed from coverage calculation
This produces a 'targeted coverage' metric focusing on actual router business logic
Auto-generated code (protobuf) should not inflate or deflate coverage metrics
Template modules are reference implementations and may not be fully exercised
